message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  It's a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  $10,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's find a way to make this work!
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,500. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
